sentences.sContent: And in the other room another chimpanzee is placed.
sentences.sContent_eng: And in the other room another chimpanzee is placed.
sentences.sCn: 而在那个房间里有另一只黑猩猩。

sentences.sContent: In chimpanzee groups, females mate with all the males, in what appears to be a strategy to reduce the risk of her children being killed by older males.
sentences.sContent_eng: In chimpanzee groups, females mate with all the males, in what appears to be a strategy to reduce the risk of her children being killed by older males.
sentences.sCn: 在黑猩猩群体中，雌性和所有雄性交配，这种策略是为了降低自己的孩子被更年长雄性杀死的风险。

sentences.sContent: Rather, we may have such strong feeling of morality because, without them, we would revert to the "evil" behavior inherent in the 97.3 percent of us that is chimpanzee.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rather, we may have such strong feeling of morality because, without them, we would revert to the "evil" behavior inherent in the 97.3 percent of us that is chimpanzee.
sentences.sCn: 而应该说，我们拥有强烈的道德意识感是因为，没了它们，我们会向体内97.3%的基因中先天“恶行”部分倾斜而堕落成黑猩猩。

trans.tranOther: an intelligent African animal that is like a large monkey without a tail
